extendedInfo.description: "Top Dog: Lucky's Charm" is a light-hearted adventure game. Help Lucky, a homeless dog, make friends and find a new home at the Top Dog Day Care. Explore your environment by tapping interesting objects, talking to dogs and trainers, using items and doing tricks.Features:-Voice acting for each dog and trainer!-Beautiful watercolor characters and backgrounds!-Original sound effects and theme song!-Over 350+ lines of whimsical dialogue!-Game automatically saves your progress!-Multiple endings! Choose your future home!-Menu lets you mute and send us suggestions/feedback!We will be adding more sound effects, animations and voice acting in future updates. What else should we add? Let us know!We hope you enjoy this game and look forward to reading your feedback! We wanted to provide a humorous game with a fun, family-friendly story. All the work on this game was done by new faces in the game industry that sincerely hope you have a good time!

reviews.title: Newton sucks!
reviews.comment: Every time I talk to Newton, he always says\"do you mind?I am busy!\"so 3 stars until that idiot Newton dog stops saying it :(
reviews.author: Sahar Abdel Haleem

reviews.title: It was nice
reviews.comment: A fun little exploring puzzle game. It was short though. More episodes and more adventures would be really nice.

reviews.title: Top dog 2!
reviews.comment: The game was great and having a top dog 2 would be good too but this one was short and on the 2 one you should have dogs that are to be puppys and the player would be the child of lucky and luckys owners couldnt keep all the puppys so he put all the pups in different pup hotels and he (fido) would find a home just like top dog 1.

reviews.comment: I think it needs to have more rooms (example : if you beat the game, there should be a whole new game set behind the bush with eyes) and lots more dogs (things like border collies)  it should also have the.option to move freely (the dog goes where you tap) and I like the top dog 2 idea the puppy should be named fluffy or spot PLEASE REPLY WITH YOUR INPUT!
